name: Abbotsford Centre
description: I rebuilt the Abbotsford Centre website in the summer of 2023 in order to elevate the venue's web presence while providing a simple method for fans to find and secure the tickets they desire.

name: Bettor Hockey Dashboard
description: The Better Bettor Dashboard is a web application that leverages the NHL Stats API to present bettors with the information they need to make LIVE betting decisions.

name: Canucks Ticketing Site
description: The Canucks ticketing site is the only premium ticketing site in the NHL that goes beyond the standard league functionality provided by NHL.com to teams.

name: Open Seer
description: Open Seer is a web application that enables users to search the Ethereum blockchain for NFTs and save the JPG from an NFT into their account, without actually owning the NFT itself.

name: Rogers Arena
description: I rebuilt the Rogers Arena website in the fall of 2022 in order to elevate the venue's web presence while providing a simple method for fans to find and secure the tickets they desire.
